original_title: The Joy is in the Work: Remembering Ann Reinking
overview: This is a tribute documentary film about Ann Reinking as a teacher, mentor, and inspiration during her time at Broadway Theatre Project between the years 1991 and 2004. Students share the stories of their experiences training with her and the knowledge she gave them in helping them grow as artists and as people. Actors, dancers, and singers from all walks of life featuring interviews from Patrick Wilson, Michael James Scott, Ashley Brown, Lorin Latarro, Matthew LÃ³pez, Connor Gallagher,  Dylis Croman, and many more.
title: The Joy is in the Work: Remembering Ann Reinking
